Vue 3 + rxjs = ‚ù§

First-class RX support for Vue 3

Get Started

Composable

Designed to work best with Vue 3's composition-api, allowing you to structure observables like never before

Lightweight

Only a small 2kb (1kb gzipped) layer above rxjs (11kb) making it a much lighter alternative to other rx-driven solutions for Vue 3

Simple

The whole library only consists of simple, predictable pure functions, which are easy to use and understand

npm i vuse-rx
